ygData.subject: Re: Collapsable pole,  A lead?
ygData.msgSnippet: One of the gnomes at the windmills has Charlotte, his pet clockwork spider.  I am a wizard of the 25th level, so I can warp everywhere there needs to be
ygData.messageBody:
One of the gnomes at the windmills has Charlotte, his
pet clockwork spider. I am a wizard of the 25th
level, so I can warp everywhere there needs to be
questions asked. I will ask him about the engineers
tonight.

I will also initiate the quest and see what I can
find.

-Kryogen Katspaw
25th Level Gnome Wizard

--- mstokes <mstokes@...> wrote:
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Pulled this from Allakhazams
>
> The Bridge: In Queynos there is a guy named Hansl
> Bigroon. If you talk to him
> he
> will talk about making a bridge to Odus. He needs a
> list of engineers
> delivered to Antonius
> Bayles' messenger. He refused to give me the list
> to someone who conned
> indifferent, so I
> don't know if a friendlier face will get it. I have
> been told that if you
> keep asking him about
> the engineers (the text is not bracketed) he will
> drop the note, which lists
> the names of the
> three engineers. The human engineer is located in
> the arcane science building
> in Freeport,
> but I don't know what you need to do to get him to
> respond (giving him the
> note doesn't work).
> But if you talk to Rucio Divella in the office of
> the people he says that
> Hansl Bigroon is the
> office manager. If asked who are the other
> engineers he says he saw them
> once, one human,
> one dwarf and one gnome. The gnome he said was
> followed around by some sort
> of automation
> (perhaps the one in Steamfont?). I am not sure
> where to go from there, but it
> sounds
> intriguing.
>
>
